summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of Ashworth Ave. N. from N. 135th St.; and from N. 140th St. to N. 145th St.; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains together with Fire Hydrants and the necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 25996 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement District therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode or "Payment by Bonds".
